messages.content: Navigate to the login page at https://example.com/login
Fill the email input field with 'user@example.com'
Check that the page title is 'Dashboard'
Verify that the welcome message is visible
Click on the menu item with text 'Settings'
Select 'Large' option from the size dropdown
Verify that the 'Save' button is disabled
Check if the error message 'Invalid credentials' appears
Wait for the page to load completely
Take a screenshot and save it as 'login-page.png'
Double-click on the file name to edit
Type 'Hello World' into the text editor
Check that the checkbox is checked
Select 'Red' from the color picker dropdown
Upload a file to the file input
Check that exactly 5 items are displayed in the list
Wait for the loading spinner to disappear
Right-click on the table row to open context menu
Scroll to the bottom of the page
Mock API response for GET /api/users with empty array
Verify that the table contains the text 'John Doe'
Click the third item in the navigation menu
Select multiple options 'Option A' and 'Option C' from multiselect
Verify that an alert dialog appears with message 'Success'
Close the modal dialog by clicking the X button
Drag element from source to target location
Wait for element with text 'Processing...' to appear
Check that input field has placeholder text 'Enter your name'
Click link that opens in new tab
const [newPage] = await Promise.all([context.waitForEvent('page'), page.getByText('Open in new tab').click()]);
Focus on the email input field
Verify that element is not visible
Check if element is attached to DOM
Wait for navigation to complete after clicking
Get text content from an element
Verify element contains specific CSS value
Click button and wait for API response
Login user with credentials from environment variables
Verify that dropdown menu is expanded
Close dropdown by pressing Escape key
Check that form validation error appears
Verify page has no accessibility violations
Test responsive design by changing viewport
Verify mobile menu is visible on small screen
Check local storage contains specific value
Verify page title matches expected value
Check if page is accessible via keyboard navigation
Intercept network request and modify response
await page.route('**/api/data', route => route.fulfill({ json: { modified: true } }));
Verify element has specific data attribute
Check that element text matches pattern
Wait for element to have specific text
Verify form has been submitted successfully
Check that pagination shows correct page number
Navigate to next page using pagination
Filter table by entering search term
Sort table by clicking column header
Verify that table is sorted in ascending order
Verify that section content is now visible
Submit form by pressing Enter in input field
Verify that search results are displayed
Check that no results message appears
Verify that dark theme is applied
Verify user is redirected to login page
Fill input field with CSS selector #username with value 'admin'
Verify element with data-attribute data-role='notification' contains text 'Success'
Click button inside div with class .modal-footer that has text 'Confirm'
Select option with value 'premium' from dropdown with name attribute 'subscription'
Verify input with placeholder 'Enter email address' has value 'test@example.com'
Click the nth(2) element in list with role 'listbox'
Fill textarea with id 'comments' with multiline text containing 'Line 1\nLine 2'
Verify element with aria-label 'Close dialog' is visible and enabled
await expect(page.getByLabel('Close dialog')).toBeVisible(); await expect(page.getByLabel('Close dialog')).toBeEnabled();
Click radio button with value 'monthly' in fieldset with legend 'Billing Cycle'
Scroll down and click on the login button with text 'Login'
await page.evaluate(() => window.scrollBy(0, 500)); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Login' }).click();
Wait for loading to finish and then verify success message appears
await page.getByTestId('loading-spinner').waitFor({ state: 'hidden' }); await expect(page.getByText('Operation completed successfully')).toBeVisible();
Fill registration form: first name 'John', last name 'Doe', email 'john@example.com'
await page.getByLabel('First Name').fill('John'); await page.getByLabel('Last Name').fill('Doe'); await page.getByLabel('Email').fill('john@example.com');
Navigate to products page and wait for products to load
Search for 'iPhone' and verify at least 3 results are shown

await page.getByPlaceholder('Search products').fill('iPhone'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Search' }).click(); await expect(page.getByTestId('search-results').getByRole('article')).toHaveCount({ min: 3 });
Add item to cart and verify cart count increases

const initialCount = await page.getByTestId('cart-count').textContent(); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Add to Cart' }).click(); await expect(page.getByTestId('cart-count')).not.toHaveText(initialCount);
Login with username 'testuser', password 'password123', and check welcome message

await page.getByLabel('Username').fill('testuser'); await page.getByLabel('Password').fill('password123'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Sign In' }).click(); await expect(page.getByText('Welcome, testuser')).toBeVisible();
Open modal, fill form data, submit and verify confirmation

await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Open Form' }).click(); await page.getByLabel('Name').fill('Test User'); await page.getByLabel('Email').fill('test@example.com'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }).click(); await expect(page.getByText('Form submitted successfully')).toBeVisible();
Filter table by status 'Active' and verify filtered results

await page.getByLabel('Status Filter').selectOption('Active'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Apply Filter' }).click(); await expect(page.getByRole('cell', { name: 'Active' })).toHaveCount({ min: 1 });
Scroll to element with data-testid 'footer' and click newsletter signup
Upload multiple files and verify upload progress

await page.getByLabel('Upload Files').setInputFiles(['file1.pdf', 'file2.jpg']); await expect(page.getByText('Uploading...')).toBeVisible(); await expect(page.getByText('Upload complete')).toBeVisible();
Switch tabs, perform action, and return to original tab

const [newTab] = await Promise.all([context.waitForEvent('page'), page.getByText('Open in New Tab').click()]); await newTab.getByRole('button', { name: 'Action' }).click(); await newTab.close(); await page.bringToFront();
Perform drag and drop from element with id 'source' to element with id 'target'
Right-click on image, select 'Save As' from context menu
await page.getByRole('img', { name: 'Product Image' }).click({ button: 'right' }); await page.getByText('Save As').click();
Hover over menu item 'Products' and click submenu item 'Electronics'
await page.getByRole('menuitem', { name: 'Products' }).hover(); await page.getByRole('menuitem', { name: 'Electronics' }).click();
Fill date picker with date '2024-12-25' using keyboard input
Verify table has exactly 10 rows and sort by 'Name' column
Check multiple checkboxes in a list and verify selection count
await page.getByRole('checkbox', { name: 'Item 1' }).check(); await page.getByRole('checkbox', { name: 'Item 2' }).check(); await expect(page.getByText('2 items selected')).toBeVisible();
Complete wizard: step 1 form, click next, step 2 form, click finish

await page.getByLabel('Step 1 Field').fill('Value 1'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Next' }).click(); await page.getByLabel('Step 2 Field').fill('Value 2'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Finish' }).click();
Test keyboard navigation: tab through form fields and submit with Enter

await page.keyboard.press('Tab'); await page.keyboard.type('First Value'); await page.keyboard.press('Tab'); await page.keyboard.type('Second Value'); await page.keyboard.press('Tab'); await page.keyboard.press('Enter');
Mock API call, trigger action, and verify mocked response is used

await page.route('**/api/users', route => route.fulfill({ json: [{ name: 'Mock User' }] })); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Load Users' }).click(); await expect(page.getByText('Mock User')).toBeVisible();
Verify responsive behavior: resize to mobile, check mobile menu, resize to desktop

await page.setViewportSize({ width: 375, height: 667 }); await expect(page.getByTestId('mobile-menu-toggle')).toBeVisible(); await page.setViewportSize({ width: 1200, height: 800 }); await expect(page.getByTestId('desktop-nav')).toBeVisible();
Handle alert dialog: trigger action that shows alert, verify message, and accept
page.once('dialog', dialog => { expect(dialog.message()).toBe('Are you sure?'); dialog.accept(); }); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Delete' }).click();
Test form validation: submit empty form, verify errors, fill correctly, submit successfully

await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }).click(); await expect(page.getByText('Required field')).toBeVisible(); await page.getByLabel('Name').fill('Valid Name'); await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Submit' }).click(); await expect(page.getByText('Success')).toBeVisible();
